description: This file contains functions for mapping and normalizing Jira issue and project data. It includes functions to transform raw Jira API responses into normalized schemas, as well as functions for handling paginated search results and creation responses.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] map_issue(raw: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Transforms raw Jira issue data into a normalized dictionary with selected fields.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] map_project(raw: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Transforms raw Jira project data into a simplified normalized structure.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] normalize_search_issues(raw_issues: List[Dict[str, Any]], total: Optional[int] = None, page: int = 1, per_page: int = 10)
methods.description: Converts a list of raw Jira issues into a normalized structure with pagination info.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] normalize_create_issue(raw_issue: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Normalizes the response from Jira after creating an issue into a standard format.

ctags.name: normalize_search_issues
ctags.pattern: /^def normalize_search_issues(raw_issues: List[Dict[str, Any]], total: Optional[int] = None, page:/
ctags.signature: (raw_issues: List[Dict[str, Any]], total: Optional[int] = None, page: int = 1, per_page: int = 10)
